flavor_text_entries.red:
While apparently
doing nothing, it
fires punches in lightning fast
volleys that are
impossible to see.
flavor_text_entries.blue:
While apparently
doing nothing, it
fires punches in lightning fast
volleys that are
impossible to see.
flavor_text_entries.yellow:
Punches in cork­
screw fashion. It
can punch its way through a concrete
wall in the same
way as a drill.
flavor_text_entries.gold:
Its punches slice
the air. However,
it seems to need a short break after
fighting for three
minutes.
flavor_text_entries.silver:
Its punches slice
the air. They are
launched at such high speed, even a
slight graze could
cause a burn.
flavor_text_entries.crystal:
To increase the
strength of all
its punch moves, it spins its arms
just before making
contact.
flavor_text_entries.ruby:
HITMONCHAN is said to possess the
spirit of a boxer who had been working
towards a world championship. This POKéMON has an indomitable spirit
and will never give up in the face of
adversity.
flavor_text_entries.sapphire:
HITMONCHAN is said to possess the
spirit of a boxer who had been working
towards a world championship. This POKéMON has an indomitable spirit
and will never give up in the face of
adversity.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
A HITMONCHAN is said to possess the
spirit of a boxer who aimed to become the
world champion. Having an indomitable
spirit means that it will never give up.
flavor_text_entries.firered:
The spirit of a pro boxer has infused this
POKéMON. It throws punches that are
faster than a bullet train.
flavor_text_entries.leafgreen:
While apparently doing nothing, it fires
punches in lightning-fast volleys that are
impossible to see.
flavor_text_entries.diamond:
The arm-twisting punches it throws
pulverize even concrete. It rests
after three minutes of fighting.

The arm-twisting punches it throws
pulverize even concrete. It rests
after three minutes of fighting.

flavor_text_entries.y:
The spirit of a pro boxer has infused this Pokémon.
It throws punches that are faster than a bullet train.
flavor_text_entries.omega-ruby:
Hitmonchan is said to possess the spirit of a boxer who had
been working toward a world championship. This Pokémon has
an indomitable spirit and will never give up in the face
of adversity.
flavor_text_entries.alpha-sapphire:
Hitmonchan is said to possess the spirit of a boxer who had
been working toward a world championship. This Pokémon
has an indomitable spirit and will never give up in the face
of adversity.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu:
Punches in corkscrew fashion. It can punch
its way through a concrete wall like a drill.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-eevee:
Punches in corkscrew fashion. It can punch
its way through a concrete wall like a drill.

such high speed, even a slight graze could cause
a burn.
